Intercom-Version.description: Intercom API version.</br>By default, it's equal to the version set in the app package.

name.description: The name of the collection. For multilingual collections, this will be the name of the default language's content.

parent_id.description: The id for the collection this section will be within.

translated_content.title: Group Translated Content
translated_content.description: The Translated Content of an Group. The keys are the locale codes and the values are the translated content of the Group.

ar.description: The content of the group in Arabic
ar.title: Group Content
